name: The Darkness v0.6.3
description:
You were minding your own business when you suddenly discovered a cave that was covered in glass and moss. You thought it will be fun to check it out, you grab your flashlight out and start exploring. That's when you get knocked out. Can you find a way out of this nightmare, play Chapter 1 for free, while Chapter 2 will be in development.

V0.6.3 Update

-Fixed scales for some UI

-Fixed grammar in most notes

-Added an extra tip in the loading scene

-Fixed bug where the game over screen wouldn't appear

-Main menu music volume was adjusted, so its not loud at 4% of volume
